prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Pipe, Guitar, Bass, Synth Pad, Piano, but without Drums.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features the Pipe, Guitar, Bass, Synth Pad, and Piano, but no Drums.

Style 2:
This song is composed of the Pipe, Guitar, Bass, Synth Pad, and Piano, but without Drums.

Style 3:
This composition is made up of the Pipe, Guitar, Bass, Synth Pad, and Piano, omitting the Drums.
